member.name: M:GetAccessToken.Program.Main(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an access token without using intervention using client secret. Note: This requries that an app registration has been set up.
member.param: Required. Client secret of app registration to call our application
Optional. Client secret of an app registration that can write to key vault
Optional. Client id of the app that can write to key vault
Optional. If not set then accesstoken will be output to screen.
Optional. Name of key vault to store access token
Optional. Name of secret in key vault to store access token
